examples: Every bullet has its billet.
A bullet grazed his arm.
The bullet went flying over my head.
The bullet lodged in her shoulder.
A bullet sang past my ear.
One bullet punctured his lung.
The bullet tore through his leg.
How long will it take for the bullet wound to heal over?
A bullet whistled past him.
He fired at him, but the bullet went wide.
The bullet didn't come close.
the zing of the passing bullet
The bullet got him in the leg.
The bullet explodes on impact.
The bullet penetrated her chest
The bullet lodged in his brain.
The bullet embedded itself in a wall.
The bullet had gone through his hand.
lodge a bullet in the table
His life has been snuffed out by a bullet.
The bullet pierced his lung.
The bullet narrowly missed her heart.
The bullet failed to penetrate.
The bullet sang past his helmet.
I finally bit the bullet and left.
He was killed by an assassin's bullet.
Doctors had to operate to remove the bullet.
The bullet passed not five inches from my head!
He was killed by a single bullet.
The bullet had entered his brain.
example_translate: Пуля пролетела у меня над головой.
Он в него выстрелил, но пуля прошла мимо.
Пуля проникла в ее грудную клетку
Пуля прошла через его руку навылет.
Пуля чуть было не попала ей в сердце. (прошла очень близко от сердца)
В конце концов, я собрался с духом и ушёл.
Врачам пришлось провести операцию, чтобы извлечь пулю.
Пуля прошла меньше, чем в пяти дюймах от моей головы!
